metadata.title: CVE-2019-18179 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Open Ticket Request System (OTRS) 7.0.x through7.0.12, and Community Edition 5.0.x through 5.0.38 and 6.0.x through6.0.23. An attacker who is logged into OTRS as an agent is able to listtickets assigned to other agents, even tickets in a queue where theattacker doesn't have permissions.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-18179` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

otrs - 6.0.24-1
otrs2 - 6.0.24-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.24-1').
